item.description:
We are hosting an adoption event on Saturday, May 2nd, 2009 for 'Echo Rescue'. The event will be held on our property and will go from 11am - 4pm. Anyone who would like to attend please join us! We will be having vendors, dog contests, auction/raffle, agility equipment will be available, and games for your human and canine children. If you have any questions either contact me personally via email or contact Nancy Hammond (nancyandangels@comcast.net).

*As I am sure you are aware, are monthly meet ups are currently scheduled for Saturday afternoons, usually from 1-2pm. If you would like me to schedule the meet ups for a more convenient time, please let me know. We can be flexible with our schedule and we would love to accommodate as many people as we can. Again, contact me if you have questions.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask anyone at the front desk!

group.name: The Greater Boston Active Dogs Meetup Group
